sentences.en: A security guard brought him down with a flying tackle.
sentences.cn: 一名保安人员飞身把他抱倒.

sentences.en: Don't forget to bring your sports tackle with you tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 别忘了明天带上你的体育用具.

sentences.en: Everyone has his problem to tackle.
sentences.cn: 每人都有一些问题要去解决.

sentences.en: Fishing tackle is available for hire.
Her problem was just too big for her to tackle on her own.
sentences.cn: 她的问题太严重了，光靠她自己是没法解决的。
她的歌曲唱的都是成年人的事情。

sentences.en: I finally hoisted him up with a block and tackle.
sentences.cn: 我最终用滑轮组把他拉了上去。

sentences.en: If Bill is late again, I'll tackle him about it.
sentences.cn: 如果比尔再迟到的话, 我就得和他谈谈了.

sentences.en: It took twelve fire engines to tackle the blaze .
sentences.cn: 出动了12辆消防车来扑救那场大火。

sentences.en: Poverty and unemployment are frustratingly hard to tackle.
sentences.cn: 贫穷和失业是难以解决的问题，这常常让人泄气。

sentences.en: The crowd continued to argue heatedly about the best way to tackle the problem.
sentences.cn: 这群人继续激烈地争论解决问题的最佳办法。

sentences.en: There is more than one way to tackle the problem.
sentences.cn: 解决这个问题不止一个办法。

sentences.en: They are not afraid to tackle the issues or let the sparks fly when necessary.
sentences.cn: 他们不怕应对这些问题，也不怕必要时来一番激烈的争论。

sentences.en: They use the tackle to lift the machine.
sentences.cn: 他们用滑车把机器抬起来.

sentences.en: We are now piloting through Parliament a new strategy to tackle youth crime.
sentences.cn: 我们正促使议会顺利通过解决青少年犯罪问题的一项新策略。

sentences.en: You can tackle him over this matter.
sentences.cn: 你可以就此事和他接洽.

sentences.en: You're bound to mistime a tackle every so often.
sentences.cn: 有时候你肯定会错估铲球的时机。

words.tran_cn: 做抓和揪动作的人；阻截队员；抱住并摔倒对方抱球队员者
固定住；暂时缝上；附加；改变航向（tack的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 起重滑车；提升滑轮；滑轮起吊设备

trans.tran_cn: 用具，装备，索具，阻挡，阻截队员
trans.tran_en: ropes and  pulleys (= wheels )  used for lifting heavy things
to try to deal with a difficult problem

trans.tran_cn: 着手处理，[橄榄球]擒住并摔倒（一名对方球员），给（马）配上挽具，处理
trans.tran_en: to try to deal with a difficult problem
to try to deal with a difficult problem
